channel.title: [317 - DELTA] NPC's not showing up in server hosted on VPS! [rep++]
channel.description:
Anyone know why my NPC's won't show up in my server?
I just put my server on to my Linux VPS and everything works fine other than the NPC's not showing up AND I can't attack NPC but I can attack players.
Anyone got any ideas as to why this may be happening?

item.title: [317 - DELTA] NPC's not showing up in server hosted on VPS! [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

all files and folders are lower cased and their still not showing up.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - DELTA] NPC's not showing up in server hosted on VPS! [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Are there any signs that the config files are even loaded?

Try making the files and folders lowercase.
